title: Hotel Feichtinger
description: A charming urban hotel in the city center started offering a full vegan breakfast to everyone (guests & non-guests) in 2014 - the first in the city. Vegans please request upon booking hotel reservations or for non-guests please call in advance. Items include granola, soy milk, juices, sparkling wine, bread, pastries, made-in-house peanut butter and more. Upon further request will serve a vegan plate with cheese, sausages, spreads, soy and fresh fruits/vegetables.
